block.p: DOHERTY--Dennis. Formerly of Inwood on April 28, 2007. Dear brother of John, Joan, Ellen and the late Kathleen. Loving uncle of Colin, Allison, Nicole and Daniel. Funeral mass Thursday, May 3 at 10am at Good Shepherd Church, NYC. Reposing at Riverdale Funeral Home, 5044 Broadway, New York, NY on Wednesday from 2-4 and 7-9pm. In lieu of flowers, donations to The Mary Manning Walsh home, 1339 York Avenue, NY, NY 10019.
